EmailTemplate.name: Event - Partner Day 2015.email - invite 2 (EN) - with image agenda
EmailTemplate.subject: Register Now for Tricentis Partner Day 2015
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://www.tricentis.com/events-webinars/tricentis-accelerate?utm_medium=email&utm_source=db>
Partner Day 2015 October 21st, 2015 2:00 pm - 8:00 pm CET Vienna, Austria Register is free of charge!
<http://www.tricentis.com/events-webinars/tricentis-accelerate/partner-day-reg?utm_medium=email&utm_source=db>
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}},
We would like to invite you to Partner Day 2015 <http://www.tricentis.com/events-webinars/tricentis-accelerate/partner-day-reg?utm_medium=email&utm_source=db>, an exciting part of Tricentis Accelerate designed exclusively for you – our partners! The event will feature technical updates and news regarding the Partner Program, as well as an open platform for discussion, networking, food and drinks, and more!
Agenda:
We look forward to meeting you in Vienna.
Best regards,
The Tricentis Events Team
